articles.title: Late-Night Cheese May Fuel Nightmares – New Study Explains How - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A new study links late-night dairy with sleep disruption and nightmares — especially for people with food sensitivities.
articles.content: Eating cheese before bed might do more than upset your stomach — it could be hijacking your dreams. Scientists found a strong connection between dairy, sleep quality, and nightmare frequency. Credit:… [+5405 chars]
